title: All the requirements of stairways in Regulation No
clause_text: All the requirements of stairways in Regulation No.9.28.8 shall apply mutatis mutandis to non-vehicular ramp. In addition, the following requirement shall be complied with.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
